content.1: Thus the heavens and the earth were finished, and all the host of them.
content.2: And on the seventh day God ended his work which he had made; and he rested on the seventh day from all his work which he had made.
content.3: And God blessed the seventh day, and sanctified it: because that in it he had rested from all his work which God created and made.
content.5: And every plant of the field before it was in the earth, and every herb of the field before it grew: for the
content.6: But there went up a mist from the earth, and watered the whole face of the ground.

content.10: And a river went out of Eden to water the garden; and from thence it was parted, and became into four heads.

content.17: But of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil, thou shalt not eat of it: for in the day that thou eatest thereof thou shalt surely die.
content.19: And out of the ground the
content.20: And Adam gave names to all cattle, and to the fowl of the air, and to every beast of the field; but for Adam there was not found an help meet for him.
content.24: Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother, and shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one flesh.
content.25: And they were both naked, the man and his wife, and were not ashamed.
